pli-tv-bi-vb-pc18:6.1: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc18:6.2: Tena kho pana samayena bhaddāya kāpilāniyā antevāsinī bhikkhunī bhaddaṃ kāpilāniṃ sakkaccaṃ upaṭṭheti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc18:6.4: “ayaṃ maṃ, ayye, bhikkhunī sakkaccaṃ upaṭṭheti, imissāhaṃ cīvaraṃ dassāmī”ti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc18:6.5: Atha kho sā bhikkhunī duggahitena dūpadhāritena paraṃ ujjhāpesi—
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc18:6.6: “ahaṃ kirāyye, ayyaṃ na sakkaccaṃ upaṭṭhemi, na kira me ayyā cīvaraṃ dassatī”ti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc18:7.1: Yā tā bhikkhuniyo appicchā … pe … tā ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc18:7.2: “kathañhi nāma bhikkhunī duggahitena dūpadhāritena paraṃ ujjhāpessatī”ti … pe …
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc18:7.3: “saccaṃ kira, bhikkhave, bhikkhunī duggahitena dūpadhāritena paraṃ ujjhāpetī”ti?
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc18:7.6: kathañhi nāma, bhikkhave, bhikkhunī duggahitena dūpadhāritena paraṃ ujjhāpessati.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc18:7.7: Netaṃ, bhikkhave, appasannānaṃ vā pasādāya … pe …
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc18:7.8: evañca pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo imaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ uddisantu—
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc18:8.1: “Yā pana bhikkhunī duggahitena dūpadhāritena paraṃ ujjhāpeyya, pācittiyan”ti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc18:9.4: … pe … ayaṃ imasmiṃ atthe adhippetā bhikkhunīti.
